amendment.description: Amendment reduces the funds for oil shale research and development by $25,000,000, and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce oil shale development by $25,000,000, and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Connolly (VA) amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 0 - 0 (Roll no. 327).
On agreeing to the Connolly (VA) amendment (A017) Agreed to by recorded vote: 208 - 207, 1 Present (Roll no. 340).
